title: LUTER Birthday Candles, Purple Blue Gradient Birthday Candles for Cake Glitter Number Candle Decoration for Kids Adults Birthday Party Wedding Anniversary Graduation Ceremony (3)
features: Package includes: 1pc number birthday candle. With purple to blue gradient color, it looks very elegant and dreamy. Very suitable for birthday party, wedding ceremonies, etc.
Size: The length of candle body measures about 6cm / 2.4inch, and the whole length is about 9cm / 3.54inch. Please check the size of our product carefully before ordering.
Reliable Material: Our number candle is made of high-quality eco-friendly paraffin, reliable, odorless and smokeless, and easy to be ignited. No damage to your body. You can use with confidence.

Beautiful Look: Our numeral birthday candle is designed into dreamy purple to blue gradient color. With big and small dots design, it looks more exquisite and special. Bright and warm light can also bring more happiness for you.

Versatile: Our number birthday candle can be widely applied for most occasions, such as birthday party, wedding party, prom, anniversary, graduation ceremony, baby shower, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, etc. Please keep it away from fire and store in the cool place. Besides, it’s very important to please keep it from those who are under the age of 5 to prevent potential danger.
